text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.text: Before sampling, roots were treated with chemically synthesized CLE peptide at 1000 nM for 12 hours.
Seeds were sterilised with sodium hypochlorite 5 min, 4 rinses sterile water, cultured on MS liquid medium, and incubated at 23ÂºC under the continuous light conditions with shaking for 7 days.
Total RNA was extracted with TRIzol (Invitrogen) and purified with Rneasy Micro Kit (QIAGEN).
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared from total RNA with GeneChip One-Cycle Target Labeling and Control Reagents (Affymetrix).
Hybridization, washing, staining procedures were conducted with Fluidics Station 450 as described in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Techinical Manual (Affymetrix).
Scanning procedure ws conducted with GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G as described in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Techinical Manual (Affymetrix).
